bio:
Talib, a Redguard man, lives in the Stonehills mining settlement outside Rockwallow Mine. Gestur Rockbreaker is Talib father.
Talib works in the mine from 8am to 6pm, then visits an old woman named Argi until 9pm. From 11pm to 8am he can be found inside his house. He wears a belted tunic and boots. He also carries an iron dagger.
He is rivals with another miner named Jesper.
name: Talib
